web_snippets: Wikipedia. Search. Lamorna Ash. Article · Talk. Language; Watch · Edit. Lamorna Juliet Ash (born 27 November 1994) is a British writer and education specialist.
Lamorna Ash is a writer, journalist, and editor at Weatherglass Books. Her first book, Dark, Salt, Clear: Life in a Cornish Fishing Town, was shortlisted ...
Lamorna Ash is a freelance writer and journalist. She has a degree in English from Oxford and a masters in Social and Cultural Anthropology from UCL.
